full_text: Re: Former inmate's property From To Date 2019/11/01 14:45 Subject: Re: Former inmate's property Attachments: TEXT.htm Hey I am adding His property may be in the FBI or OIG's possession. Thanks, Supervisory Staff Attorney CLC New York Metropolitan Correctional Center 150 Park Row New York, New York 10007 p: (646)836 f: (646)836-7665 1/1/2019 2:43 PM Hey guys, I received a phone call from who claims to be Jeffrey Epstein's brother. He was asking the status of Mr. Epstein's property and if or when it would be released to him. I explained to him that normally we mail it to the last known address on record. He left his number just in case anyone wanted to reach out. Case Manager Coordinator Federal Bureau of Prisons Metropolitan Correctional Center 150 Park Row New York, NY 10007 Tel: (646)836-6300 Fax: (646)836-7683 @bop.gov Page 6047 DOJ-OGR-00024410

text_blocks.content: Hey I am adding His property may be in the FBI or OIG's possession.
Supervisory Staff Attorney CLC New York Metropolitan Correctional Center 150 Park Row New York, New York 10007 p: (646)836 f: (646)836-7665

Hey guys, I received a phone call from who claims to be Jeffrey Epstein's brother. He was asking the status of Mr. Epstein's property and if or when it would be released to him. I explained to him that normally we mail it to the last known address on record. He left his number just in case anyone wanted to reach out.
Case Manager Coordinator Federal Bureau of Prisons Metropolitan Correctional Center 150 Park Row New York, NY 10007 Tel: (646)836-6300 Fax: (646)836-7683 @bop.gov

additional_notes: The document is an email chain discussing the property of a former inmate, Jeffrey Epstein. Multiple names and contact information are redacted.
